    Uploads a business document for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `business:write`

  body={{"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"Business document type","example":"articles_of_incorporation"},"file":{"type":"string","description":"Business document file","format":"binary"},"opt_out":{"type":"boolean","description":"If `can_opt_out` is `true` for the document type, an optional flag to opt out of the business document because it is not applicable for your business.","example":false},"entity_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the entity or person the document is associated with","example":"rep_5mQSxcSAW3UZ4ijLzEt4RuAib"},"entity_type":{"type":"string","description":"Type or role of entity the document is associated with","example":"business_representative"}}},"encoding":{"type":{"style":"form"},"file":{"style":"form"},"opt_out":{"style":"form"},"entity_id":{"style":"form"},"entity_type":{"style":"form"}}}}}}
